text:
It seems that the <Alias> element as described in the documentation doesn't 
work at all. I've set a basic server up with an additional virtual host 
(besides the default localhost one) and deployed a single webapp : 

<Host name="dpeapc8" appBase="webapps" unpackWARs="true">
  <Alias name="dpeapc8.ota.marc.societe-generale.fr"  />
  <Context path="/myfavoriteapp" docBase="web-averagefee" debug="0" 
reloadable="true"/>
</Host>


http://dpeapc8:8080/myfavoriteapp work but
http://dpeapc8.ota.marc.societe-generale.fr:8080/myfavoriteapp  doesn't work


NB : dpeapc8 is the alias name of my desktop on the network (dpeapc8.ota.... is 
the full qualified name)

This has been experimented on NT and on solaris 2.6


Gilles
creator: gilles.philippart@ota.fr.socgen.com
remm@apache.org
text:
The correct syntax is <Alias>dpeapc8.ota.marc.societe-generale.fr</Alias>.
I just checked with my own configuration, and it works well.

I know, I know, the docs say otherwise :-(
It will be fixed.
*** Bug 4951 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
